turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, what would you like to do today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I would like to order some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: order some pizza, sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bella Luna, ok i can do that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pizza would you like to order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: three.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size will your pizza be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your choice of toppings? and any other special instruction?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one with just cheese, one with pepperoni and olives and one with extra cheese and I want them all to be on a gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 with cheese only, 1 with pepperoni and olives, 1 with extra cheese all with gluten free crust is that your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, 3 medium pizzas your total comes to 57 dollars, shall we go ahead and make the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, go ahead and order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful, your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria, and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that'll do it. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, have a good day.
